<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Giant's Stature](/Feats.aspx?ID=5828) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=670" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=676" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 79 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Giant instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=11)

**Requirements**
You are Medium or smaller.

</column>

---

You grow to incredible size. You become Large, increasing your [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=684) by 5 feet and gaining the [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) condition until you stop raging. Your equipment grows with you.

<title level="2">Giant's Stature leads to...</title>
[Titan's Stature](/Feats.aspx?ID=5860)
name: Giant's Stature
